client.Room

Class RoomServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Room.RoomServices

  • public class RoomServices
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the business logic related to the room on the client side.

      • handleCreateRoom

        public void handleCreateRoom(java.lang.String name,
                             int capacity,
                             int building,
                             boolean hasProjector,
                             boolean hasComputer,
                             java.lang.String description)
        This method creates String with all room attributes and send it to the server to create the room
        Parameters:
        name - : room name
        capacity - : room capacity
        building - : room building number
        hasProjector - : if there is a projector in the room
        hasComputer - : if there are computers in the room
        description - : small description of the room

      • handleUpdateRoom

        public void handleUpdateRoom(int id,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             int capacity,
                             int building,
                             boolean hasProjector,
                             boolean hasComputer,
                             java.lang.String description)
        This method create String with all room attributes and send it to the server to update the room
        Parameters:
        id - : room id
        name - : room name
        capacity - : room capacity
        building - : room building number
        hasProjector - : if the room has a projector
        hasComputer - : if the room has computers
        description - : small description of the room

      • handleCreatedRoom

        public void handleCreatedRoom(java.lang.String msg)
        This method split the server message to see if the creation is a success or a failure. It change a state for the UI.
        Parameters:
        msg - : String with the result of creation
